original_text: “You shall make a mercy seat of pure gold. Two cubits and a half shall be its length, and a cubit and a half its breadth.
korean_text: 순금으로 속죄소를 만들되 길이는 두 규빗 반, 너비는 한 규빗 반이 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: You shall make a mercy seat of pure gold.
Two cubits and a half shall be its length,
and a cubit and a half its breadth.
